item.description: Performance Upgrades It is for these reasons that I regard the decision last year to shift our efforts in space from low to high gear as among the most important decisions that will be made during my incumbency in the office of the Presidency. item.title: About
item.description: I am Jitachi, a product designer made of curiosity, stubbornness, and a hint of foolishness, per Professor Utonium's words. Currently Founding Designer at Railway Since 2021, I’ve been poured my heart and soul into Railway —a modern software deployment and observability platform—as the founding designer. Before Sr Product Designer at Rainforest Automated Software QA 2019-2021 Founding Designer at Kong Enterprise-grade API Tooling 2019-2021 Product Designer at Corpfolder Mexico-specific Accountability Software 2019-2021 Interaction Designer at Freshout RIP.
